dcterms:creator: A. Geiger
P. Lenz
C. Stiller
R. Urtasun
dcterms:description: KITTI is an autonomous driving dataset taken at 61 scenes with an average image resolution of 375 × 1242. It is used for evaluating depth estimation models.
dcterms:title: KITTI

dcterms:creator: Nathan Silberman
Derek Hoiem
P.K.
R. Fergus
dcterms:description: NYU Depth V2 is an indoor depth estimation dataset taken at 494 scenes with an original image resolution of 480 × 640. It is used for evaluating depth estimation models.
dcterms:title: NYU Depth V2
